DataElement.preferredName: Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale Total MSAS Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calculated numeric value resulting from the average of the symptom scores of all 32 symptoms in the Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale questionnaire.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale Total MSAS Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A patient-rated instrument developed to provide multidimensional information about a diverse group of common symptoms. This 32-question, self-rated questionnaire evaluates the prevalence, characteristics, and distress associated with each of the symptoms._A subscale of the Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale that is the average of the symptom scores of all 32 symptoms in the full MSAS instrument._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A patient-rated instrument developed to provide multidimensional information about a diverse group of common symptoms. This 32-question, self-rated questionnaire evaluates the prevalence, characteristics, and distress associated with each of the symptoms.

Concepts.definition: A patient-rated instrument developed to provide multidimensional information about a diverse group of common symptoms. This 32-question, self-rated questionnaire evaluates the prevalence, characteristics, and distress associated with each of the symptoms.

Property.preferredDefinition: A subscale of the Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale that is the average of the symptom scores of all 32 symptoms in the full MSAS instrument.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A subscale of the Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale that is the average of the symptom scores of all 32 symptoms in the full MSAS instrument.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: MSAS-SF:Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale Short Form.Chang VT, et.al., Cancer. 2000 Sep 1;89(5):1162-71.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale Total MSAS Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric score resulting from the average of the symptom scores of all 32 symptoms in the MSAS instrument (each symptom score is an average of its dimensions).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.origin: MSAS-SF:Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale Short Form.Chang VT, et.al., Cancer. 2000 Sep 1;89(5):1162-71.

DataElement.origin: MSAS:Memorial Symptom Assessment Scale. Portenoy, RK, et.al. Eur J Cancer. 1994;30A(9):1326-36.
